properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT '{Config.sourceSystem}' AS SRC_SYS_CD
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.RESOURCEID) as RSRS_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.FACTORYID) as FCTRY_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.LOCATIONID) as LOC_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.ISSPECID) as SPEC_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as ALT_ASSET_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as ASSET_SITE_NM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as ASYNC_TMOUT_TXT
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as CALIBRATION_ASSET_IND
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.CIOCHANNELADAPTERID) as CIO_CHNL_ADPT_ID
, INT(RESOURCEDEF.CHANGECOUNT) as CHG_CNT
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.CHANGESTATUSID) as CHG_STS_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.CLEARANCELEVEL) as CLRNC_LVL_CD
, INT(RESOURCEDEF.ISCAPACITY) as CNTNR_CAPY_CNT
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.ISCONTAINERSTATUS) as CNTNR_STS_CD
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.DECIMALPRECISION) as DEC_PRCN_VAL
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.DECIMALSCALE) as DEC_SCALE_VAL
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as DFLT_EXPRSSN_TXT
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as DFLT_EXPRSSN_TYPE_CD
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as EXTRNL_STS_IND
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.FULLYQUALIFIEDNAME) as FULL_QUAL_NM
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.ICONID) as ICON_ID
, CAST(RESOURCEDEF.ISINCLUDEINOEE as BOOLEAN ) as INCL_IN_OEE_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as INCL_RAW_DATA_IND
, CAST(RESOURCEDEF.ISFROZEN as BOOLEAN ) as IS_FRZN_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_RESL_DNT_QRY_IND
, CAST(RESOURCEDEF.ISVALIDATEQUEUE as BOOLEAN ) as IS_VLD_QUE_IND
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.ISLINEIDENTIFIER) as LINE_ID
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as LOGGING_IND
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.MAINTENANCECLASSID) as MAINT_CLS_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as MATL_QUE_BOM_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.ETHCMMSDISTRIBUTIONID) as MAXIMO_DSTN_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.ETHCMMSGLACCOUNT) as MAXIMO_GL_ACCT_CD
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.ETHCMMSNAME) as MAXIMO_RSRS_NM
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.MAXIMUMCAPACITY) as MAX_CAPY_VAL
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.MINIMUMCAPACITY) as MIN_CAPY_VAL
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.CDOTYPEID) as OBJ_TYPE_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.ISOEESETTINGSID) as OEE_SETS_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as OPC_CHNL_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as OPC_MACH_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as OPC_SERVR_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.PARENTRESOURCEID) as PARNT_RSRS_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as PC_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as PORT_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.PRINTQUEUEID) as PRT_QUE_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.PRODUCTIONSTATUSID) as PRDTN_STS_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as PRMT_TXT
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.READABILITY) as READABL_VAL
, CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as RSRS_CAPY_QTY
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.DESCRIPTION) as RSRS_DESC
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.RESOURCEFAMILYID) as RSRS_FMLY_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.RESOURCENAME) as RSRS_NM
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.ISRESOURCEID) as RSRS_NUM
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as RSRS_PART_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.RESOURCESTATUSMODELID) as RSRS_STS_MDL_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.RESOURCETYPEID) as RSRS_TYPE_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.ETHESIGREQUIREMENTID) as SGNTR_REQ_ID
, CAST(NULL AS INT) as TIME_TO_LIVE_SECS_CNT
, CAST(NULL AS INT) as TRNG_RCNT_EXP_DAYS_CNT
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as TRAIN_RCNT_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.TRAININGREQGROUPID) as TRAIN_REQ_GRP_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.UOMID) as UOM_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.VENDORID) as VEND_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.VENDORMODEL) as VEND_MDL_NUM
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.VENDORSERIALNUMBER) as VEND_SER_NUM
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.WEBSERVICETRANSPORTID) as WEB_SRVC_TRNSP_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.WIPMSGDEFMGRID) as WIP_MSG_DEF_MGR_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.WORKINGRANGEMAX) as WRK_RNG_MAX_VAL
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.WORKINGRANGEMIN) as WRK_RNG_MIN_VAL
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.ETHPRINTQUEUEID) as ETH_PRT_QUE_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.ETHRESOURCETYPEID) as ETH_RSRS_TYPE_ID
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.LASTREVTXNID) as NOTES_TXT
, TRIM(RESOURCEDEF.NOTES) as LAST_REVERSABLE_TXN_ID
FROM  {Config.sourceDatabase}.RESOURCEDEF as RESOURCEDEF WHERE RESOURCEDEF._deleted_ =  'F'
  
 
""")
